definition: the quality of lacking intensity or substance
details:
noun
- the quality of lacking intensity or substance
= example: the quality of lacking intensity or substance
= synonyms: feebleness
- a rarified quality
= example: a rarified quality
= synonyms: rarity
- relatively small dimension through an object as opposed to its length or width
= example: relatively small dimension through an object as opposed to its length or width
= synonyms: thinness
